input.sentences: boyfriend and girlfriend visiting the town .
it was a rainy and cold day .
organization organization boots shaped christmas mugs .
buying holiday sweets at the bakery .
eating out after a long day .
output.sentences: Joe went to the town his girlfriend Molly moved to, he had never been there before.
Joe met Molly's mother and they all went out together to show Joe the town.
Since wandering the town is so tiring, everyone stopped in a pub along the way to have a drink.
The pub also had ice cream in homemade waffle cones!
At the end of the evening Joe and Molly told everyone they had met at the pub goodbye, and went home to Molly's place.
